section_title: Payment of grants to British Film Institute.
section_text: 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  the Treasury may from time to time make grants to that Institute of such amounts as they think fit out of moneys provided by Parliament.
2 This Act may be cited as the British Film Institute Act 1949.
